page.title: 01PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content:
OUR AREA HAS A LOT OF{FARMING LAND. } THERE IS A PRIMARY {SCHOOL }AT CHURCH BROUGH,BUT THE ONE IN MUSGRAVE CLOSED FOUR YEARS AGO.WE HAVE THE { {RIVER }EDEN,SWINDLE AND AUGILL BECKS WHICH RUN THROUGH OUR BLOCK FROM THE EAST TO THE WEST.THE FELLS OF THE { {PENNINES} ARE IN THE NORTH.
BOTH THE NORMAN {CASTLE}AND ST MICHAELS CHURCH ARE IN CHURCH BROUGH . THERE IS THE CHAPEL TOO.THERE IS ST THEOBOLDS CHURCH IN MUSGRAVE.THERE IS A SERVICE FOR RUSHBEARING AT THAT CHURCH.
WE HAVE PART OF THE WARCOP{ARMY RANGE} WHERE THE SOLDIERS TRAIN.THERE IS A BY -PASS WHICH IS OUT SIDE BROUGH BUT THE MAIN A66 ROAD USED TO RUN THROUGH THE VILLAGE.
